ordersText.title: DREAD JUDGEMENT
ordersText.general: At the start of the resolution step of a combat you start with this order, you may force your opponent to choose and destroy 1 of his routed units in the contested area. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: PURGING BANNERS
ordersText.general: When you reveal this order token, rally all of your units in the active system. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: SIGILS OF REVELATION
ordersText.general: When you reveal this order token, you may look at all order tokens in any stack. Then you may discard 1 of your order tokens from that stack to place 2 of your order tokens from your play area onto the top of your event deck. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: TERROR STRIKE
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. During this orbital strike, you may spend 2 [S] to force your opponent to choose and retreat 1 of his units on this world, as if it was a defender. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: INEVITABLE EXECUTION
ordersText.general: During this orbital strike, gain 1 [D]. You may resolve this orbital strike against any world in the active system. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: VIOLENT ACQUISITION
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* After you resolve an Advance Order, you may discard this card to collect an Inquisition objective token that is on a friendly world in the active system.

eventsText.title: PSIONIC WARFARE
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* When you reveal an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to choose an order upgrade card in any player's play area. That order upgrade card is considered used during this round.

eventsText.title: STRATEGIC EXCRUCIATION
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Instead of revealing an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to discard a scheme from another player's play area.

eventsText.title: RADICALS AND PURITANS
eventsText.general: Either purchase 1 structure, reducing its cost materiel by 1, and place it on a friendly world not containing a structure, or destroy 1 of your structures on any world to gain materiel equal to its materiel cost increased by 1.

eventsText.title: ELYSIAN DROP TROOPS
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free Stormtrooper on an uncontrolled world in a system containing at least 1 of your ships or place 1 free Stormtrooper on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: MINISTORUM'S DOGMA
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 combat upgrade, reducing its materiel cost by 1 for each system with no enemy units, to a minimum of 1.

eventsText.title: IMPERIAL MANDATE
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* After placing your first order token during the Planning Phase, you may discard this card to place 1 additional order token. If you do, you place 5 order tokens during this Planning Phase.

combatText.title: BLINDING SALVO
combatText.general: If you are attacking, your opponent cannot resolve the general abilities of his next revealed combat card. *newpara* If you are defending, gain 1 [D].

combatText.title: SHADOW ASSIGNMENT
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: If you have more [M] than your opponent, force your opponent to either choose and rout 1 of his units or to spend a die of your choice.

combatText.title: PSYKER SHIELD
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: Spend 2 (S) to place 1 free reinforcement token in this area.

combatText.title: UNQUESTIONABLE WISDOM
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Discard 1 combat card from your hand. Gain that card's combat icons until the end of this execution round.

combatText.title: FRENZON IMPLANTS
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Spend 2 (B) to convert all of your [M] into [B].

combatText.title: SANCTIONED PSYKER
combatText.general: Your opponent may spend 1 [B] to gain 1 (B). If he does not, force your opponent to lose 1 [S].
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Your opponent rerolls 2 dice of his choice. For each [B] rolled, gain 1 (B) and 1 (S). For each [S] rolled, gain 1 (S).

combatText.title: UNFLINCHING CRUSADERS
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: If you are defending, rally 1 of your units. *newpara* Force your opponent to lose either 1 [S] or 2 (B).

combatText.title: RELENTLESS ASSAULT
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: If you are attacking, rally 1 of your units. *newpara* Spend 1 [S] to gain 2 (B).

combatText.title: FAITH GUIDANCE
combatText.general: If you are attacking, your opponent cannot resolve the unit abilities of his next revealed combat card. *newpara* If you are defending, either gain 1 | or retreat 1 of your units.

combatText.title: LIDLESS STARE
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Black Ship: Your opponent loses 3 dice of his choice. Then you spend 3 of your dice.

combatText.title: STORM ENVOY
combatText.general: Reroll either 1 [B] or 1 [M] to force your opponent to lose 1 [B].
combatText.unit: Valkyrie: Take 1 Stormtrooper from any world and place it on this world. *newpara* Black Ship: Take 1 Stormtrooper from any world and place it on a friendly or uncontrolled world in this system.

combatText.title: HELLSTRIKE MISSILES
combatText.general: Reroll either 1 [S] or 1 [M] to force your opponent to lose 1 [S].
combatText.unit: Valkyrie/Black Ship: Destroy 1 of your opponent's routed units.

combatText.title: TRUESILVER ARMOUR
combatText.unit: Grey Knight/Black Ship: During this combat, the health value of your units is increased by 1.

combatText.title: DEEP STRIKE
combatText.general: Either gain 1 (B) or convert up to 3 of your dice into [B].
combatText.unit: Grey Knight: When an enemy unit suffers damage during this execution round, it is destroyed. *newpara* Black Ship: Rout 1 of your opponent's units.
